name: Creamy Lemon Pie
author: Vernita Bles

ingredients.name: pkg. (4 serving) Jell-O instant vanilla pudding
can (6 oz.) frozen lemonade concentrate thawed

instructions: Pour milk into a large bowl, add pudding mixes. Beat with wisk 30 seconds. Add lemonade concentrate and beat 30 more seconds. Mixture will be thick. Immediately stir in whipped topping. Spoon into crust. Refrigerate four hours or until set. Garnish with lemon slices, if desired.
